div.p: As soon as I had sealed the previous letter, I learned that a meeting of the four cities, Zürich, Bern, Basel, and Schaffhausen, is scheduled for Sunday in eight days in Aarau, etc. Herewith I send you the judgment, quite unfounded, against Mr. Egmond. Dated in haste, God be with you, as in the letters.
To the pious, honorable Mr. Joachim Bäldi, former Landammann of Glarus, my kind, dear sir.
